pkgmetadata.longdescription:
[![](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/env2json.svg?maxAge=3600)](https://pypi.org/project/env2json/)[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-Unlicense-blue.svg?longCache=True)](https://unlicense.org/)### Installation```bash$ [sudo] pip install env2json```#### Examples`.env.dev````bashDB_NAME=nameDB_USER=usernameDB_HOST=127.0.0.1DB_PORT=5432``````bash$ python -m env2json .env.dev > .env.dev.json````.env.dev.json````json{ "DB_HOST": "127.0.0.1", "DB_NAME": "name", "DB_PORT": "5432", "DB_USER": "username"}```
